alert.note: Alert for Dent; Shannon; Texas (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 31 at 1:00PM CDT until March 31 at 1:30PM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 130 PM CDT FOR NORTHWESTERN SHANNON...DENT AND EAST CENTRAL TEXAS COUNTIES... At 100 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 8 miles east of Raymondville, or 15 miles east of Houston, moving northeast at 75 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Montauk State Park, Salem, Montauk, Turtle, Jadwin, Howes Mill, Darien, Gladden, Boss, Howes, Akers, Stone Hill and Sligo. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 800 PM CDT for south central Missouri. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
